about_the_game:
Dive into the dynamic streets of Japan in this captivating open-world delivery game! Embrace the role of a determined delivery person, navigating through vibrant urban landscapes adorned with neon lights and traditional Japanese elements. With anime-stylized characters and stunning visual effects, every delivery is an adventure against time, filled with challenges and surprises.

Take on a variety of missions—from delivering delicious food and essential spare parts to urgent medical supplies and even daring encounters with the Yakuza. Explore a sprawling open world with diverse locations, including bustling cities, tranquil parks, charming villages, and bustling construction zones.

But it's not just about deliveries. Create your own life with extensive character customization, a variety of transport options, and the ability to own and personalize houses and apartments. Experience the perfect blend of modern city life and traditional culture in beautifully crafted environments. Are you ready to deliver and create your own story?

name: Courier Chronicles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Experience the vibrant streets of Japan in this open-world delivery game! Navigate through neon-lit cities, serene parks, charming villages, and busy construction zones. Complete various missions, from food delivery and spare parts to medical supplies and Yakuza encounters.
